trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a new App Service gateway to handle authentication.
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to create a new App Service gateway to handle authentication.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a gateway in the same resource group, you do not need to complete this section.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a gateway in the same resource group, you do not need to complete this section.

trans-unit.source: Click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > the backend that you just created.
trans-unit.target: Click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > the backend that you just created.

trans-unit.source: You will be presented with a blade for creating your gateway.
trans-unit.target: You will be presented with a blade for creating your gateway.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to enter any information, and the name of this gateway is automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: You do not need to enter any information, and the name of this gateway is automatically generated for you.

trans-unit.source: Next, you will use this gateway with an authentication provider.
trans-unit.target: Next, you will use this gateway with an authentication provider.
